General.Name: American Business Corp
General.Description: American Business Corp. does not have significant operations. It intends to identify and enter into a business combination with a privately owned business. Previously, the company provided freight transportation services to corporations and operated a regional truckload carrier in the short and medium haul market segments. American Business Corp. was formerly known as Logistics Management Resources, Inc. and changed its name to American Business Corp. in June 2004. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Louisville, Kentucky.
General.Address: 11921 Brinley Avenue, Louisville, KY, United States, 40243
